commentable_entity.title: Wrongful Civil Justice Verdict
commentable_entity.description:
The Verdict against Amber Laura heard on June 2nd 2022 was wrongful and extremely damaging not only to Ms. Heard but to all women in general. Considering the surplus of evidence regarding domestic abuse withheld from being admitted in the Farifax County trial, the unsequestered Jury as well as the jovial charade the plaintiffs legal team orhastrated, Ms.Heard did Not stand a fighting chance whatsoever of any legal success.

As a result. Ms. Heard has been publicly, emotionally, mentally and spiritually humiliated far more than any  human being in modern history!

This is a duped defining tragedy of our country's legal system and how it can be altered to favor an entertainment icon and not the real victim still fighting not only for her rights as a human being, but for her very life itself.

Amber Heard is the focal point in this chapter of history which has opened two paths. If her story is not acknowledged appealed or repaired, we ALL may could be heading towards a dark path no longer-known as human history.

Daniel Edward Farr

comment:
Amber’s emotional strength and mental fortitude is everything I aspire to. I want to be a person that is strong both for myself and others and Amber has shown that is incredibly possible even with all the hate she’s been subjected to.

She is beaut, intelligent and kind. She’s a complete human and I am so glad I got to discover that about her as a person.
